Using this for Helldivers commands to auto-execute the arrow keys is peak gaming immersion! 

"Oribital, need artillery barrage at my location, danger close!"  - executes artillery barrage  :D

"Jarvis need jetpack" - jetpack deploys

185086113.review:
El programa reconoce mi voz ya que se muestra la barra de audio. Pero no se muestra el registros como a otros usuarios.
Donde puedo buscar ayuda?
185086113.developer_response: This could be a number of things @Yusak.  You'll want to come by the VoiceAttack Discord https://voiceattack.com/discord or the VoiceAttack user forums to talk about it https://voiceattack.com/forums - it's usually something simple, so come on by.

185039566.review: Excellent software. Very user friendly with a lot of options.

185002291.review: В Helldivers 2, эту программу использовать самое то, стало проще вызывать стратагемы, не тыкая кнопки на клавиатуре во время ожесточенных боёв и прочее. Возможно в других играх тоже удобно будет использовать, особенно в VR играх.

184851984.review:
5 gold stars, 2 thumbs up, A+

VoiceAttack was waaaaay ahead of its time and STILL IS.  
You can do literally anything with this program.
With all the AI voice assistants that are out now, VoiceAttack still shines over all of them.

Hands-free operation of every and any function on your computer...
Play video games by speaking!
Amazing macros - simple 1 line commands or elaborate 100 line If/Then Functions!

184707145.review:
Just but it and grab a HCS voice pack... you'll regret nothing!

184472374.review:
a veces no funciona..
con quest3 no funciona la mayoria de veces..quizas sea problema de las gafas
184472374.developer_response:
It is absolutely a problem with the Quest 3.  I have a Quest 3, and it is not very suitable for speech recognition due to noise filtering and the proximity of the microphone. You would want to try a different microphone (training the speech engine with your new microphone).

Hope that helps!

184261915.review: Ein recht gutes Unterstützungsprogramm. Ich kann es nur empfehlen :).

184116679.review: Eines der nützlichsten Tools überhaupt. Sei es zum Steuern von Spielen oder von OBS zum Streamen.

183897178.review:
I once bought a VoiceAttack software key with astra and some other plugins back in 2016 when i was playing elite dangerous with a friend. It was amazing! 

A couple of weeks ago, I came across that key again.
I decided to rebuy VoiceAttack on steam and use my key again.

It can take some work to set it back up again (if you forgot how to) but its actually really easy.

Then use your voice to activate a command with a keyword or a whole line, and becouse of A.S.T.R.A you can get complete awsers as feedback and let the software input the key commands instead.

If you like to play games like:
elite dangerous, X4, star citizen, Helldivers 2, microsoft flightsim, star wars, No man's sky, etc..

And decided to use VoiceAttack with your games, then i suggest checking up on this site for the add-on voice packs aswell becouse it completely changes everything into a way more inmersive gameplay.

https://www.hcsvoicepacks.com/


I have this program started up when i boot up my computer (so dont bother my ingame time).
